title: Rhubarb & custard tart
ingredients: ['For the shortcrust pastry', '200g plain flour', '100g cold butter, cubed', '60g caster sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '2 dessertspoons of cold water, or as needed', 'For the filling', '500g rhubarb, sliced', 'For the homemade custard', '225ml double cream', '1 vanilla pod, split', '50g caster sugar', '3 egg yolks', '1 level tablespoon plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon butter']
